About

Established in 2015, our history goes back to 1988 when Hernando Melendez got his first job as a window cleaner in Maryland state

Soon after getting his first job, Hernando could proudly say he had worked in every major building in Maryland state including the Supreme Court, The Capitol, Dulles and Reagan airports and hundreds of other building in the state

In 2007, while working for Kevco Building Services Inc, Hernando was interviewed and featured in The Washington Post and The Insider in articles titled"Hangin' With a High-Rise Window Washer".In these articles, Hernando talked about the challanges, joys and dangers of working in the cleaning services industry

Featured in The Washington Post

Read The Washington Post artricle →

"If you don't feel scared doing this job, you can make a mistake. We trust what we are doing, but we also have all of the respect in the world for this job. Safety is our number one concern"

- Hernando Melendez

A new beginning

In 2015, with 27 years of experience working in the cleaning services industry we decided to open up a new business where we could offer cleaning services and continue to do what we love

Nice and Clean Solutions LLC was established to provide our surrounding communities with high quality cleaning services. We pride ourself in our work and services we provide. We consider every detail and encourage our customers to ask questions about or work. Every project we complete has to meet our high standards because we believe our work highly reflects on our company name and reputation
